The Home School 

     The home is a school, where all may learn how they are to act in the church. When all are members of the royal family, there will be true politeness in the home life. Each member of the family will seek to make it pleasant for 


                                     -69- 

every other member. The angels of God, who minister to those who shall be heirs of salvation, will help you to make your family a model of the heavenly family.
